data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Okinawa, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Okinawa, Japan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,021 believers in Okinawa to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 128 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Okinawa, Japan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Okinawa that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Okinawa, Japan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kunigami people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kunigami people.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Okinawa, Japan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Okinawa, Japan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Okinawa, Japan has a population of 1,416,600.

We estimate Okinawa has 8,021 people who might know Jesus, 22,618 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,385,961 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Okinawa, Japan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
